title: Historian on women in the Revolution - effect

content.question: During and immediately after the Revolutionary era, which of the following resulted most directly from the efforts of women such as those described in the excerpt?

choices.label: The extension of voting rights to women nationwide
The reform of laws regarding womenâ€™s property ownership
The creation of a national network of abolitionist societies
The ideal that women would teach republican values

content.answer: The ideal that women would teach republican values

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
